title: Smart fabric weaves computer data into your wardrobe
text:
Smart fabric weaves computer data into your wardrobe Sunday, February 11, 2018 - 01:42 
With smart fabric you can open a door with the swipe of your arm, no keys or ID needed. Angela Moore will show you how it's done. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
With smart fabric you can open a door with the swipe of your arm, no keys or ID needed. Angela Moore will show you how it's done. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2sjzTvk
